alert.note: Alert for Bucks; Chester; Montgomery; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:36PM EDT until July 25 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Central Bucks County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Northern Philadelphia County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 235 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Collegeville, or 18 miles northwest of Philadelphia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Norristown, Phoenixville, Lansdale, West Norriton, East Norriton, Doylestown, Conshohocken, Hatboro, Souderton, Ambler, Collegeville, Jenkintown, Chalfont, Trappe, Hatfield, Rockledge, Abington, Schwenksville and Bryn Athyn. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 321 and 348. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 35. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 335. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 16 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
